summary: MANUFACTURER STATES THAT PROBLEM FIXED IN CAR SEATS MADE AFTER 11/2001.  FIRST CAR SEAT MADE 25 JAN 01, SECOND, 20 JULY 01. HOUSING FOR HARNESS STRAP ADJUSTED BREAKS OFF OF SEAT BACK.  STRAP WILL NOT LOOSEN SPONTANEOUSLY BUT I AM UNABLE TO ADJUST STRAP TO PROPER FIT SINCE THE HOUSING IS BROKEN AND ADJUSTER IS NO LONGER ATTACHED TO SEAT BACK.  FIRST SEAT BROKE AFTER APPROXIMATELY 6 WEEKS OF USE.  SECOND AFTER 10 DAYS.  WE FOLLOWED OWNER'S MANUAL AND EVENFLO REPRESENTATIVE INSTRUCTIONS FOR ADJUSTMENT.   AK  SCC    ***DIMSII IVOQ POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****751638
